data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moradmand, Majid, Jäger, Peter (2011): A review on the huntsman spider genus Spariolenus Simon, 1880 (Araneae: Sparassidae: Heteropodinae) in Iran with description of four new species. Zootaxa 2910: 46-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.277803
